column5: Are the Roughriders everybody's 2nd favourite team?
Next to Bills,I like the Green Machine.LOL

It's all about the blue bombers!!  I have to root for them because they are the RAT-BAST***S that took out the Argos.  (granted the argos sucked out the last game)  However,  having lost their starting QB to a broken arm,  I feel any betting man  should place money on SASK.  Never the less;  I like a good under dog story.  Here's to the Bombers!    also   LETS GO ARGOS  .....  because I can.
Taking the Green Riders because nobody loves cfl more than there fans, Those fans deserve the party.
Do the Browns play in the Grey Cup? I know they don`t play in the Super bowl!
For me it was a happy ending just to see the RCMP walk into the stadium with the Grey Cup and to be able to leave without tazering anyone to death.
